channel.title: Help this beginner out
channel.description:
Hi,
I was recently banned from runescape for 14 days on a macroing charge, so I've been trying all day to figure moparscape out but I'm having problems. First off I have NO FREAKIN IDEA what I'm doing. I'm not that great with codes and what not, and I have tried playing on a couple different servers but they are always down. Please provide beginner information on how I can get started playing. Thank you for reading.
P.S.
I downloaded that one thing (cannot remember the name of the program) that you use to use no-ip address, but it simply disconnected my sprint broadband and i had to uninstall it to reconnect to the internet.

item.title: Help this beginner out
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Use the search bar, (mostly) everything needed is there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help this beginner out
item.dc:creator: @oxo-Evo-oxo oxo-Evo-oxo
item.description:
@oxo-Evo-oxo wrote:

thank you I’ll look into to, but as i said, I have been looking into this all morning and I’m having alot of trouble. :’(

also, im not exactly interested in making a server, as i am in joining an already existing one.

Read full topic

item.title: Help this beginner out
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Moparscape is an all around runescape private server help/release/etc forums, this section is for when you have an problem when correcting/need help with somthing that you don’t understand how to do on the server-side.

Read full topic
